thread.title: OG Maco Releases Desperado World Tour Dates
thread.title_full: OG Maco Releases Desperado World Tour Dates

author: NHHMS
title: OG Maco Releases Desperado World Tour Dates
text:
http://www.billboard.com/files/styles/promo_225/public/media/OG-Maco-2015-billboard-1548.jpg 
OG Maco will be spending the first four months of the new year on the road. 
Young Greatness and Levi Carter will join the Atlanta rapper’s Desperado World Tour , Maco announced Monday (Jan. 2). 
Beginning Jan. 20, the trio will touch down in Europe, then head stateside for dates in March and April. See full tour dates on the poster below. 
The release of Maco’s highly anticipated debut album for Motown/Capitol Records, to be called Children of the Rage, has been stalled. The label’s signee told Billboard back in January 2016 that he was hoping to release it by summer of last year. 
Unveiling the song “Monster” a few weeks ago, Maco wrote, “This track is on #ChildrenOfTheRage, but since I’ve been unable to drop it, I made three more albums and decided I’ll be dropping songs from it at random.” 
Last month, he released an EP titled For Scott , as a tribute to Kid Cudi . 
Best known for his 2014 debut single, “U Guessed It”— which went viral and hit the Billboard Hot 100 — Maco lost his right eye in a near-fatal car accident this summer.
